Description:
Prestigious Bellarine Peninsula
Situated on 80 Acres (32.37 Ha) of prime undulating productive country, and commanding magnificent panoramic Bay Views to Mornington Peninsula & Port Phillip Heads, this elevated allotment holds unlimited potential for future home sites, or to build your dream residence (S.T.C.A). The property offers a Farm house & shedding watered by dam and rainwater storage, all situated on 33 Acres of quality vines. There is currently long term lease-back to Scotchmans Hill.
'Bundaleer' is located on Mount Bellarine in the Blue Ribbon Heart of the prestigious Bellarine Peninsula, 5 minutes from Portarlington/Drysdale, 15 minutes from Queenscliff (ferry service), 20 minutes from Geelong, 35 minutes from Avalon Airport and 70 minutes from Melbourne CBD & International Airport.
Insights: 451 Founds Road, Drysdale VIC 3222 was last sold in 2015 and 22 other 3 bedroom house in Drysdale have recently been sold.

Description:
Bellview Drysdale- 3 Bedroom Townhouse!
This quality townhouse is situated in the heart of Drysdale just minutes walk to all facilities. Public transport passes the property. The home comprises spacious open plan kitchen, meals and living area, 3 generously sized bedrooms with full ensuite to master. Robes in all. The double remote garage has internal access with a small roller door giving access to the rear of the property. Central heating and reverse cycle AC keep the home comfortable all year round. An undercover area for outdoor living and tidy gardens complete this delightful property. A must to inspect.

Description:
Country Life in the Heart of Township
Set on almost two acres, this classic style home offers comfortable family living right in the heart of town. Surrounded by other lifestyle farmlets and vineyards this very private and tranquil property is only a short stroll to schools, shops and public transport.
As you enter the property through the large double entry and bright entrance hall which leads to formal lounge room and family room. Boasting 4 large bedrooms, all with great storage, 2 Bathrooms and 2 large living rooms.The country kitchen offers stainless steel appliance and ample bench and cupboard space with adjoining meals area over looking paddocks with west facing deck to enjoy the rural views.
With a long drive way leading to the property you will hardly believe you are just minutes from the centre of Drysdale.

Unique Acreage
A fantastic opportunity to secure rare acreage in Drysdale. Seldom will you find a parcel of land with so much to offer. This vacant 2.3 Acres (app) offers a perfect blank canvas to build your dream home with potential views over Geelong and the Bay. This accessible acreage is tree lined and fenced, offering close proximity to reserves, Schools and the Drysdale Shopping Centers. This substantial allotment is a blank canvas ready for you to paint your future.

Description:
'Mary Doble Cottage', a charming retreat
A serene cottage lifestyle beckons. Rich with history, 'Mary Doble Cottage' makes a gorgeous 3 bed, 2 bath retreat or family home near the Bellarine's beautiful coast, historic train station, lakes, walking trails and picturesque Drysdale Village. Coveted heritage features include high ceilings, Baltic pine flooring, timber paneling, open fires, and beautiful double-hung windows. A deep verandah wraps the home on three sides, offering a captivating place to sit and enjoy the colourful cottage garden. The generous block creates privacy and invites extensions (STCA).
Additions to the original cottage include new roofing and a large North-facing living, dining and sitting area with freestanding wood heater. This open-plan living hub is well protected by an ornamental grape covered terrace, providing an ever-changing backdrop. The kitchen is the perfect place to gather for a family meal, with brick hearth, timber bench tops, wall oven & gas hob adding rustic charm. The cosy lounge, with open fire, is a lovely retreat for gathering with friends. Two comfortable beds gather near the entry, with master bedroom offering an open fire. The third bed opens off the lounge and makes an ideal guest room. The spacious bath boasts a heritage style vanity, large shower, and a luxurious claw-foot bath inviting long soaks. The 2nd bathroom doubles as a laundry.
Outside is a secluded brick-paved courtyard and a large studio/storeroom with wide verandah which offers the artist and craftsperson an ideal studio space, and the perfect place for outdoor entertaining. Secure parking is offered by the gated drive.
Create a new history here! Inspect ASAP.
- Coveted heritage features throughout
- Spacious North-facing living hub, plus lounge
- 3BRs, Master BR with open fire
- 2 baths, 1 with claw-foot bath
- Large block, ideal for extensions (STCA)
- New roof and wrap around verandah
- Secluded brick-paved courtyard
- Studio/storeroom
Land: 1033 sq m approx.

Description:
The Secret Garden
This immaculately presented architect built home, in a highly sought after location, offers space and tranquility that one can only dream of. Within walking distance to Drysdale Primary, Christian College and Drysdale Village shopping centre.
On entry of the property you are taken into the formal lounge room with stunning gas log fire and pitched high ceilings allow an abundance of natural light and adjoining formal dining with doors opening onto alfresco areas for extra room for entertaining. The master bedroom with full ensuite, separate study are also located at the front of the property. From the formal dining area you enter through to the modern kitchen with breakfast bar and ample cupboard and bench space. The open plan family room with classic wood heater offers sliding doors that open onto outdoor undercover alfresco area. There are also another 2 bedrooms with built in robes and central family bathroom.
Externally the home is surrounded by meticulous gardens with veggie patches, 3 car garage, tandem carport with workshop and open spaces next door to make you feel like you are really living in the country but truly are on the bay.

Description:
HOME DESIGNED FOR ENTERTAINMENT
Do you enjoy entertaining family and friends? Do you enjoy Pizzas and BBQ's? Do you like space around you? Then we have the home for you. Never pay for pizza delivery again be creative and make your own at home in the outdoor entertainment area.
When the Vendors built this home they had entertaining in mind. Step inside and immediately feel at home in this spacious home. With careful design and planning the areas of importance have been upsized to excellent effect. You can feel like you are at the movies relaxing back in the Lounge. Large kitchen with clear view to chat to your visitors as you prepare food, better still there's enough room for helpers. The men will be happy here too as there is a large workshop tucked from view in the back yard.
Combine these features with the close proximity to all your day to day requirements you can't go wrong.
Drysdale is a historical country town that has big city amenities. Recreational options such as wineries, cafes, restaurants, bike trail, sporting groups along with fishing. Necessary amenities such as schools, medical centers, shopping precincts the list goes on. Away from the hustle and bustle of a coastal town designed for a quiet existence. I await your call to book an inspection.
Insights: 8 Leonard Drive, DRYSDALE VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 22 other 3 bedroom house in DRYSDALE have recently been sold.

Description:
Wonderful Wookey Home In Peaceful Court Location on approx 1,150m2
** NOTE - WEEKEND OPENS HAVE BEEN CANCELLED FOR THIS PROPERTY **
Undeniable family appeal comes to mind the second you lay eyes on this quality built 'Wookey' home in a rarely found quiet cul de sac conveniently positioned close to local shops and amenities. Epitomising the phrase 'neat as a pin', this sensational home on an incredible 1,148m2 block would suit families looking for room to roam, seniors with a love of gardening or investors looking for safe returns in this growth corridor between city and surf.
Offering a rare parcel of land and affordability to match, the home comprises 4 spacious bedrooms (master with WIR and ensuite) and 2 light filled living areas to accommodate the whole family with gas ducted heating and central cooling maintaining your comfort all year round. The central bathroom is pristine while the kitchen with huge walk-in-pantry and quality appliances completes this compelling package.
Outside the home really sets itself apart with an undercover area and BBQ allowing room for entertaining friends and family, while the huge yard give kids and pets room to roam. For those that love spending time in the sun there are gorgeous established gardens providing a private sanctuary to relax in. If that wasn't enough, the remote double lock up garage and large garden shed provides room for all the boys toys while allowing secure car accommodation.
Extras: Water tanks, cubby house and so much more! Enquire today.

Description:
Idyllic lifestyle property overlooking the Bay
From the moment you drive through the stone feature gates, and follow the tree lined driveway you know this property is special.
This feature stone home has been designed to capture the stunning views of Corio Bay, the You Yangs & the night lights of Geelong.
A delightful entry foyer welcomes visitors to this amazing home. A large open plan kitchen & dining room has feature display cabinets & a large island bench all designed with entertaining in mind.
Feature stone walls add to the warmth and character and floor to ceiling windows frame the captivating views from most rooms.
The vineyard is well established and has been well maintained.
Other improvements include:
A large processing shed with office & cool room.
Solar power panels.
Rain water tanks and town water connection.
This idyllic lifestyle property is located in the picturesque Bellarine Penisula, set on an elevated 13acre(approx) allotment with grand panoramic views.
What are you waiting for.

Description:
SOLD PRIOR TO AUCTION
Unforgettable in its innovative design featuring vast living and entertaining expanses this contemporary showpiece is the ultimate lifestyle home.
Set on an enviable 1,460m2 the property has been built for leisure. Boasting a covered outdoor courtyard, large established garden and walls of glass allowing natural light to flood into this beautiful home.
An entire wing of the home has been designed to accommodate children offering three bedrooms, rumpus room and study.
With clean lines and an abundance of space this fantastic property is located in an unrivalled setting only a short stroll to the Christian College, Drysdale village and schools.
Features Include:
* Bold and creative floor plan maximising the outlook and natural light
* Palatial open-plan living area, grand and vast interior spaces
* Three living areas, four bedrooms plus a study
* Terraces off most rooms, enormous entertaining decks
* State-of-the-art kitchen with breakfast bar and European appliances
* Sleek designer bathrooms with stunning distinct styling accents
* Ducted central heating and evaporative cooling plus a host of modern conveniences
* Automated double lock-up garage and additional driveway parking
Greg Campbell : 0415 553 854

With plenty of scope to renovate or extend, this warm for and welcoming home is ready for the next chapter in its life.

ARCHITECT DESIGNED, CLOSE TO DRYSDALE VILLAGE, TOP SPOT.
Great unit in the heart of town with a leafy street close to parklands. This five star energy rated home has a modern open plan living with quality fittings and fixtures, plus subtle colourings to further enhance. Three bedrooms master with ensuite and WIR, other two have BIR's, central bathroom, laundry and separate toilet. Features include ducted heating/cooling, quality appliances, dishwasher, pantry, good storage and single garage. Downsize in style or invest well for the future.

Description:
BE SURPRISED BY THE SIZE OF THIS UNIT
In a desirable location is this larger than average unit just a very short walk to all you need to live in this amazing place. Drysdale is a country town that has the amenities of a large city. This well maintained three bedroom abode should tick many of your boxes. Large L shaped lounge dining. A kitchen you will enjoy spending time in with everything at your fingertips. Main bedroom has WIR while other 2 have BIR's, two- way bathroom with a separate toilet. Keeping warm in winter is no issue with the gas wall furnace. Keep the 40 degrees of summer outside with the split system and the outside awnings. Completing this package is a single garage and nice undercover area to enjoy reading the paper. An inspection will impress. When are you free to see?

Description:
Grand Family Home
AVAILABLE FOR INSPECTION SATURDAY 17 JANUARY - BY APPOINTMENT
Why build when you can just walk into a fantastic complete package like this, all the work has been done and is now ready and awaiting. Situated in a highly sought after pocket of Drysdale this family home can only be descibed as grand and could be the one you have been waiting for.
4 generous sized bedrooms with BIRs serviced by complete family bathroom. Master bedroom offers large ensuite with large spa bath and WIR. The light filled open plan living and meals area features stylish kitchen with stainless steel appliances including 900mm wide stainless steel oven. Leading out to an outdoor under cover alfresco area and secure family friendly backyard ideal for indoor/outdoor living.
The home also offers second living area, separate dining or home office area, study, family room or rumpus, double lock up garage, side access for boat, caravan or trailer, secure family pool, ducted heating, quality fixtures and fittings and neutral tones throughout.
With easy access to both Geelong and the Bellarine Peninsula. A fantastic lifestyle opportunity!

This stunning custom built home oozes features that only DREAMS are made of and secures the ultimate unity of quality, luxury & location!
Designed to take full advantage of the Northerly aspect, the open plan design secures light drenched living and entertaining for all of the family. From the grand double door entry and oversized garage to the 9ft ceilings and fabulous timber floors - this breathtaking property simply welcomes you home!
The millimeter perfect garden and low maintenance landscaping round out this desirable package and confirm that what is on offer here exceeds the standard bricks and mortar and presents for you a lifestyle investment for now and the future!

Description:
Gorgeous fusion of contemporary design and rural lifestyle
This large modern home and self-contained unit, on 1 acre, fuses contemporary design with a rural lifestyle. Hugely proportioned, this property caters for extended family and maximises privacy to the outdoor entertaining area.
The floor plan wraps 3 sides of an expansive, north facing, Tuscan-style courtyard. The 4th side is shrouded by established foliage creating a calming garden vista for all zones indoors. Raked ceilings, floor-to-ceiling windows and glass sliders to the courtyard enhance space. A luxurious feel is achieved with the extensive use of porcelain floor tiles which extend through all zones.
Parents and children have separate zones, as well as a large open plan communal living area.
The kitchen is a highlight, boasting quality fittings and an abundance of space. The walk-in pantry is indeed a room with an enclosed appliance cupboard, ample shelving, space for fridges and freezers and garage access. The chef faces the guests across a curved breakfast bar and is surrounded by stainless steel appliances including; D'amani 900mm oven, cooktop and range hood and Fisher &Paykell double drawer dishwasher.
The living area boasts gas log fire and built-in audio-visual joinery. Dining easily accommodates 8.
The parent's wing is a self-contained haven with relaxing retreat, spacious bedroom, walk-through robe and impressive en suite with corner spa, dual basins, a double shower and separate toilet.
At the rear, the children can entertain themselves in their own wing. 3 bedrooms (2 with walk-in robes, 1 with built-in robe) bud off a large walk-through study with built-in office cabinetry. The family bathroom is high-end yet functional with shower, bath, twin basins and a separate toilet. The family-sized laundry sits in this wing next to a convenient powder room. Everyone will enjoy the rumpus space, which merges with the courtyard and the backyard.
Total comfort is achieved with split system ACs in the master bedroom, rumpus and living zones.
The unit boasts a similar contemporary feel. The open plan kitchen/living space features a Rinnai gas heater, reverse cycle AC and garage access. 2 queen-sized bedrooms flank a two-way bathroom with twin basins, shower and toilet. This gorgeous getaway is ideal for guests or elderly relatives.
Twin double garages separate the unit from the main dwelling offering privacy to both.
The property has a corner aspect and maybe be subdivided STCA. The yard features a chicken coup, fruit trees and plenty of space for animals and vegetable gardens.
- Large modern home and self-contained unit, on 1 acre
- Floor plan wraps 3 sides of an expansive, north facing, Tuscan-style courtyard
- Vast kitchen/living/dining hub with quality appliances and a huge pantry room
- Parent's wing with retreat, spacious BR, walk-through robe and impressive en suite
- Children's wing with study, 3BRs, large bathroom, rumpus, powder room and laundry
- Twin double garages separate the home and unit offering privacy to both
Land: 4340sqm approx.
Insights: 90-100 Woodville Street, DRYSDALE VIC 3222 was last sold in 2015.

Description:
Pristine and stylish living in the hub of Drysdale
Built just four years ago, this pristine family home stands out from the pack with a modern colour scheme, stylish kitchen and sparkling bathrooms. Wide windows throughout and raised ceilings give a feeling of spaciousness. A double roller blind system, incorporating sheer and block out options, allows privacy without compromising on natural light. Tiling has been used to tie together the kitchen, meals, halls and wet areas, with neutral carpeting to the living area and bedrooms. Modern ceiling fans and down lights have been used throughout.
The location speaks for itself, with the home set on a quiet street, walking distance from Drysdale's charming town centre, schools and sporting centres, just a hop from the beach and golf course at Clifton Springs, and only a short drive to Geelong!
Set well back from the street and with a wide frontage, this near-new solid brick home has a wide veranda to protect the entry. From the private formal entry, complete with security door, the home opens into an open plan kitchen and meals, with adjacent living area. The entertainers' kitchen features fresh white cabinetry compliments the warm bench tops and tiled splashback, hitting the right mark for style. Completing the perfect set up are matching Bosch gas cooktop, fan-forced electric oven and dishwasher, a double fridge cavity, generous pantry with powered appliance shelf, and the ever-essential wide island bench with breakfast bar for quick family meals. A multitude of wide drawers are a thoughtful addition, ensuring that this stylish kitchen is a pleasure to use and nothing ever gets lost at the back of a cupboard! The wide meals area with RC-AC, opens through double sliding doors to the covered outdoor entertaining area, for easy indoor-outdoor living year round. The adjoining carpeted living room enjoys views of the front garden, with twin highlight windows set each side of an energy efficient, freestanding climate controlled Coonara heater. This heater keeps the home toasty through the cooler months while providing a charming centrepiece for the room.
All bedrooms are east facing, keeping them cool and comfortable throughout the summer months and all offer ceiling fans. The well-proportioned master bedroom is zoned off the living area and features a spacious walk-through dressing room with in-build robes, leading into the roomy and bright en suite. Fresh white cabinetry and tiles, with neutral bench tops run with the modern theme used in the kitchen. The spotless en suite offers a wide vanity with recessed sink, toilet and semi-frameless shower with feature tiling. Bedrooms two and three are zoned off the meals area, creating a dedicated children's wing, both with plenty of room for study and play, and both with double built in robes. Close by is the sparkling family bathroom with the same fresh colour scheme used in en suite and kitchen, bringing stylish continuity to the home. The spacious family bathroom has a bath, semi-frameless shower and wide vanity with recessed basin. The separate toilet is situated beside the family bathroom. The laundry, also zoned to this area, offers backyard access, plenty of bench space and a double linen press, with a second linen press located in the hall, plus internal access to the garage.
Mod-cons include RC-AC to kitchen and meals, large water tank plumbed to toilets, and freestanding climate controlled Coonara heater to living, with ceiling fans throughout.
Outdoors, catch some rays in the North-facing entertaining area. Zippered outdoor weather blinds transform this area into an ideal year-round retreat. Elevated fences ensure privacy, while the low maintenance raised garden beds that border the lawn make the perfect sunny place for a veggie garden and fruit trees. The double lock-up garage with concrete driveway has an automatic roller door, power and light, with a window and door into the back yard, offering an excellent place for a workshop and general storage. A second, separate concrete driveway located at the side of the house is perfect for securely storing caravans, boats and trailers.
This appealing, good-as-new home in pretty Drysdale won't last long, so be quick and inspect today!
- Good as new: Modern colour scheme, stylish kitchen and sparkling bathrooms
- Pristine entertainer's kitchen with matching Bosch appliances & on-trend drawer storage
- Master bed with spotless en suite & dressing room, bed 2 & 3 with BIR & ceiling fans
- Living area with energy efficient climate controlled Coonara gas heater
- North-facing outdoor entertaining area with quality zippered weather blinds
- DLUG with concrete driveway, plus separate secure driveway for storing toys
Land: 561 sq m approx.

Description:
SHOW HOME QUALITY IN CENTRE OF TOWN
This beautifully presented abode of show home quality sits amongst beautifully manicured gardens, both edible and ornamental, creating a fantastic outlook from indoors and a great backdrop to the spectacular alfresco area; the ultimate bayside lifestyle!! The large plot of 724sqm is perfectly suited to those with additional recreational vehicles to store and is set in the heart of Drysdale only a short walk to schools, shops and entertainment venues. This home truly offers a tranquil and relaxed life.
The brick and tiled home has been designed with flair. Soaring raked ceilings within the living space bring the leafy green outlook right into the home. Vast and zoned, open plan spaces are separated by a gourmet quality galley kitchen with stainless steel appliances with glass mosaic features tiles across the splashback. North facing and filled with natural light thanks to a bank of highlight windows, a casual sitting area links with both the dining and kitchen spaces which spill out onto the extensive alfresco deck through large sliding glass doors. Protected by stylish shade sails for those hot summer months, this outdoor space performs as a third living area, protected on three sides from the elements creating a calm and tranquil spot to enjoy the lush gardens.
A second living, (again linking to the kitchen and outdoors), is where the family will gather for those snug and more intimate occasions.
4 bedrooms are zoned perfectly for family living with a master suite located at the front of the home with a large walk in robe, and an ensuite beautifully tiled with a chocolate and mushroom scheme. 2 further minor bedrooms feature sliding door robes (1 with TV & phone point suitable as study) while the third offers its own walk in robe, perfect for young children and all of their toys. A central family bathroom offers a fully recessed shower and luxurious sized bath with a wide surrounding hob, which sits beneath a large window, perfect for lining with candles on nights where you want that sumptuous hotel feel.
Outdoors will also not disappoint. Along with the remote double garage with direct internal access, the huge plot with 18m street frontage allows double gates leading to the rear yard to allow for extra vehicle storage. A graveled parking bay behind stylish timber gates easily allows for both caravan and boat storage for those lucky enough to own all the toys! Down the back of the plot, behind a healthy stretch of Santa Ana lawns and a beautiful display of evergreen hedging and statement Silver Birches, a well established mini orchard and fenced veggie patch will keep the gardener busy. An array of apple, apricot, pear, nectarine, plums and lemon will keep the pantry full throughout the year.
- Soaring raked ceilings to living
- Stylish galley kitchen
- 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms
- Side yard access for boat/caravan
- Fantastic alfresco space
- Established orchard/veggie garden
Land: 724 sqm approx.

Description:

Architecturally designed home will impress the most astute buyer. Offering separate living & dining rooms with a central kitchen. High ceilings and polished timber floors are a highlight of this exceptionally finished residence.
The Kitchen with stone bench tops, a butlers pantry & island bench overlooks the covered alfresco area.
Separate lounge room.
Indoor / outdoor sun room with PVC blinds, gas heater & TV point make it an ideal rumpus or games room.
The Gymnasium room is large enough for bench equipment & running machine.
Laundry is spacious & a wall length linen press.
Generous master bedroom with ensuite.
All three bedroom with walk in robes.
Spacious central bathroom with corner spa.
Sheltered outdoor timber deck.
For comfort the windows are double glazed, extra thickness insulation.
The home is warmed by floor central heating and cooled by a reverse cycle split system.
Double garage (7.5m x 6m) with internal access.
Secure space for a caravan or boat.
Option to purchase adjoining rear allotment of 524 sqm (18 The Glen) $155,000 (separately titled)
Close to the centre of town offering easy access to schools & amenities, in a quiet location.

Description:
Charming Californian Bungalow plus You Can Walk Everywhere!!
BURILDA A charming cottage in a fantastic walk to everything position awaits you.
Beyond the picket fence is a striking Californian Bungalow Style home, featuring 3 bedrooms, lounge , formal dining room, open plan living/meals/family area that leads you to the full length rear bi fold doors where you can sit on the deck, entertain in style and listen to all the wonderful bird life that surrounds this picture prefect property.
An array of many other features is included in this fantastic home;
Gas Log Fire Places x 2
Ducted Heating
Air-conditioning
Polished Hardwood Timber Floors
Ensuite To Master Bedroom
Dishwasher
Gas Cooking Appliances
Bay and Leadlight Windows
Separate Study/Studio or 4th Bedroom
Remote Control Garage and extra off street car parking
Side Access Ideal For Caravan/Trailer Storage
Outdoor Entertaining Zone
Full Rear undercover deck
Land Size 730 m2 (Approx)
This charming home is ideal for all downsizers , holiday rental or investors plus anyone looking to get out of the hustle and bustle of the city, Don't waste any time on this one as it won't be on the market long
